DOC.criteria: Written inform consent . Confirmed clinical molecular diagnosis Becker Muscular Dystrophy ( BMD ) , Facioscapulohumeral Muscular Dystrophy ( FSHD ) , LimbGirdle Muscular Dystrophy ( LGMD ) Independently ambulatory Patients certain clinical condition Patients use steroid medication potential affect muscle function History sensitivity monoclonal antibody protein pharmaceutical Pregnant lactate woman .
